ActSpecial Appointment Regulations, No. 2006-22
PrecisAppointment of YVAN ROY of Ottawa, Ontario, to the position of Deputy Secretary to the Cabinet (Legislation and House Planning and Machinery of Government), and Counsel, Privy Council Office, to hold office during pleasure, effective October 10, 2006.
